attributes.action: allow us to know if we have child abusers living in our community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people in this country have children that go to play at nearby parks or go out to play with their friends. We should be able to let our children do this without having to worry whether or not the area is safe. I do not support vigilantes but I do think we should be allowed to know whether our children are being put at risk by convicted sex offenders.
